originalText.text: Divorce is never easy but having skilled New York divorce lawyers on my side like Ross and Asmar made it tolerable. There was no long bitter divorce trial. Everything was worked out between the attorneys. I really feel that they had my best interest at heart. The lawyer also kept me filled in throughout the entire time.

originalText.text: I was able to keep my residence here in the US with the help of Ross and Asmar. I came to the US with an E3 Visa and had a job offer. The company retracted the offer and I was facing losing my visa. With the help of this great immigration law firm I was able to remain here. I had another job offer and now I can stay. I could not have done it without the help of an awesome immigration lawyer.

originalText.text: Criminal attorneys Ross & Asmar did a great job defending our son when he was charged in with assault. She was able to show that several people had threatened him and he simply defended himself. He swore all along that he was innocent and Mr. Asmar she was able to convince the New York district attorney to dismiss.

originalText.text: Ross and Asmar are very competent and skilled attorneys in many different areas of practice. I have retained their services and seen them at work in the courtroom. They always have the best interest of their clients at heart and defend them aggressively. I was very privileged to have an attorney from Ross and Asmar as my criminal attorney in two separate matters.

originalText.text: The law firm of Ross and Asmar represented my family in an immigration matter last month. The immigration attorney we had did an awesome job of getting all of the problems rectified. We no longer have to worry about the immigration agents coming to give us a hard time. If you need am immigration lawyer I would recommend contacting Ross and Asmar.
